author: ismunoz.fytoboros
title: Cardano enabled sustainable food
description: Meat products contribute to ~15% of human carbon footprint. Plant-based meat products account for only <3% of meat sales.
solution: We will create non-meat bones and use tokenomics to incentivize distributed culinary developers to build surrounding plant-based meat.
experience:
Ismael Munoz, PhD. 6+ yrs Tissue Engineering, Materials
Jia Yang. 6+ yrs SpaceX Engineer
Travis Yatsko. 6+ yrs Software Engineer, SPO, TPM
